name: Appropriations - S/C on Articles VI, VII & VIII

participants.committee_id: ~{"name": "Appropriations - S/C on Articles VI, VII & VIII"}

agenda.description: HOUSE OF REPRESENTATIVES NOTICE OF PUBLIC HEARING COMMITTEE: Appropriations - S/C on Articles VI, VII & VIII TIME & DATE: 7:30 AM, Thursday, February 14, 2019 PLACE: E1.026 CHAIR: Rep. Toni Rose The subcommittee on Articles VI, VII, and VIII will meet to hear testimony on House Budget recommendations for the following agencies: · Public Utility Commission of Texas · Office of Public Utility Counsel · Texas Department of Licensing and Regulation · State Office of Administrative Hearings · Texas Funeral Service Commission · Board of Professional Geoscientists · Office of Injured Employee Counsel · Office of Public Insurance COunsel · Board of Plumbing Examiners · Texas Racing Commission · Texas State Securities Board Public testimony will be taken and may be limited to five minutes. Agenda items not considered during this hearing may be carried over to a future schedule. NOTICE OF ASSISTANCE AT PUBLIC MEETINGS Persons with disabilities who plan to attend this meeting and who may need assistance, such as a sign language interpreter, are requested to contact Stacey Nicchio at (512) 463-0850, 72 hours prior to the meeting so that appropriate arrangements can be made.
